scripts.build:apk: cd android && gradlew assembleDebug && echo APK: android/app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk
scripts.build:ios: cd ios/App && xcodebuild -workspace App.xcworkspace -scheme App -configuration Release -sdk iphoneos -archivePath build/App.xcarchive archive
scripts.dev: npm run sync && npm run run
